projects.title: React.js Developer
projects.description: Working with German clients on freelance basis, developed a Next.js project that utilized material UI and connected to the headless CMS Prismic. Developed MERN Stack E-commerce shop with Admin panel using React.js. Experienced with MongoDB (Database), Redux (Workflow), Restful APIs in (Node.js)
